content:
Does this occur for every email you 'reply' to OR only some? It is possible the email you are replying to has it's own html css controlling the colour of font.

It looks like you are using thunderbird Light theme. In SEttings > Composition under HTML style What settings are you using ? Post an image showing what you currently have got set up.
creator: Toad-Hall

content: Check the advanced button under 'server settings' to review the number of connections you have set.
creator: davidsk

content: You might try disabling your antivirus and rechecking. There might also be settings in it to allow emails.
creator: davidsk
